nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 60: Luke Skywalker's Last Stand! is the sixtieth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes Pursuit!, the black & white fourth and final part of The Kingdom of Ice. First published in color in Pizzazz magazine, The Kindom of Ice was incomplete until its final part was printed here. It wasn't colored until its reprint in the first Marvel Illustrated Books volume from where Dark Horse Comics took it for its Star Wars Omnibus series.
